RetryableDeliveryJob - Class in permafrost.tundra.tn.delivery
A DeliveryJob which delegates to another DeliveryJob, but also supports taking into account the job's retry settings when saved after failure by using TimeUpdated to schedule the next retry at the appropriate time in the future.
